This place is absolutely delicious! And the team is so warm and friendly. The moment I walked in, I received a warm smile and friendly welcome. And when I sat down, my waiter carried on that warmth (such a great feeling especially for a tourist!) I ordered Rigatoni Bolognese - it's not on the menu but it was something I was craving - a glass of wine and some bread.I highly recommend this place for anyone craving pasta or pizza. (i hear their pizza is amazing but I haven't tried this yet)
